title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Planning
body: Planning       Here you will find various reports of Pipe Spring's history, botany, and geology. Annotated Checklist of Vascular Floral (pdf) (~1mb) Cultures at a Crossroads: An Administrative History of Pipe Spring National Monument (pdf) (10mb) Pipe Spring National Monument Geologic Resources Inventory Report (pdf) (3mb) - Geologic Map Vascular Plant Flora of Pipe Spring National Monument: 2008 Update (pdf) (1.5mb) Vegetation Classification and Mapping Project Report (pdf) (4mb) Vegetation Management Plan Phase I (pdf) (4mb) Vegetation Management Plan Phase II (pdf) (10mb) Vegetation Mapping at Pipe Spring National Monument (pdf) (~1mb)
